## arrayReplaceOne() function

Replaces the first match of itemToRemove with replaceWith.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function arrayReplaceOne<TItem>(items: TItem[], itemToRemove: TItem, replaceWith: TItem): void;
```
